cgcloud__Tactic_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Template__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Template__c.description: Template that controls the behavior of a tactic.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether a tactic template is active.

cgcloud__Additional_Condition_KPI_1__c.description: Reference to additional KPI Definition 1 for the condition.

cgcloud__Additional_Condition_KPI_2__c.description: Reference to additional KPI Definition 2 for the condition.

cgcloud__Additional_Condition_KPI_3__c.description: Reference to additional KPI Definition 3 for the condition.

cgcloud__Condition_Change_Rule__c.description: Determines the rule to handle past conditions.

cgcloud__Condition_Creation_Definition_L.description: Defines which configuration is used to create conditions out of tactics.

cgcloud__Condition_Product_Group_Level__.description: Specifies the product level at which the condition can be set.

cgcloud__Default_Lift_Type__c.description: Lift type used as the default for the tactic.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Selects the description depending on the current language.

cgcloud__Display_KPI_Subset__c.description: Subset of KPIs that are shown on the Spend Planning card.

cgcloud__Enable_Condition_Creation__c.description: Determines whether the condition creation is enabled.

cgcloud__Number_Of_TT_Cond_Creation_Def_.description: Number of tactic template condition creation definitions. A maximum of 3 TCCDs are allowed per tactic template.

cgcloud__Order_Relevant__c.description: Boolean that identifies whether the tactic template is order-relevant.

cgcloud__Possible_Lift_Types__c.description: Lift type to be used or shown for the lift calculation.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the tactic template.

cgcloud__Tactic_Total_Amount__c.description: Determines the configuration that provides the total amount for a tactic to be used in the progress bar.

cgcloud__UI_Contract__c.description: Reference to the UI Contract that's mapped to the tactic template. This is used to display the layout of the tactics.
